        public Jail getJail(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a jail by the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the jail to get.
        Returns:
        The Jail with the given name, if no jail found this will return null.

      • isValidJail

        public boolean isValidJail(java.lang.String name)
        Checks to see if the given name for a Jail is valid, returns true if it is a valid jail.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the jail to check.
        Returns:
        True if a valid jail was found, false if no jail was found.
